alert.note: Alert for Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 04 at 9:53PM CDT until April 05 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM CDT TUESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHEASTERN SOUTH DAKOTA... * AFFECTED AREA...In Nebraska...Fire weather zone 013 Dixon.In South Dakota...Fire weather zone 038 Beadle, Fire weather zone 053 Sanborn, Fire weather zone 054 Miner, Fire weather zone 060 Hanson, Fire weather zone 061 McCook, Fire weather zone 066 Turner, Fire weather zone 069 Yankton, and Fire weather zone 070 Clay. * WIND...West to northwesterly sustained winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 30 to 45 mph. * HUMIDITY...Lowest relative humidity of 15 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
